data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you always face forward in your body you can always take 9 steps left. If you always face forward in your body you can only take 9 steps right. If you always face forward in your body you can only take 9 steps left. If you always face forward in your body you can only take 10 steps forward. So, the answer is yes.

Turn around means to return to where you started. Turn around means to turn around and turn right. A way of returning to this point is to turn right. So, the answer is No.
